name: Demolition Job '99 (Team Penhale Games)
description:
A rich local businessman finds opportunity in abandoned Bockhampton to create a supermarket complex.
The acquired land comes with buildings that must be promptly destroyed!
Take on the crazy Curling Tournament, destroying every abandoned object and property, earning points and upgrading your vehicles as you try to get as close to the target as possible.

Controls:

W - Accelerate
A - Steer Left
D - Steer Right
S - Break (if unlocked)
Enter - Next car

Hint: There are 8 turns in total. Once the car stops, press Enter for next turn.
The closer you are to the target, the higher your score multiplier.

Accessibility:
Choice of English or Polish.
Colour blind modes available in settings.

Made by:

Mikolaj Brzuchalski

Alex Jarrett
